Description.Text: City Nites Aldgate offers luxurious, fully furnished apartments in the restored Grade II listed Victorian building 'Sugar House,' and the brand new developments of 'Christopher's Court' and 'Times Square.' Offering both one and two bedroom light and spacious, open plan, stunningly designed apartments, which can sleep up to four people, comfortably. These spacious apartments are perfect for getting ready before a long day at work or an evening out with all the amenities such as hairdryer, washing machine and iron, along with a fully equipped kitchen to get your meals ready at your own convenience. City Nites Aldgate is perfectly placed for both business and leisure guests centrally located in the heart of The City. A wide variety of public transport links are available, the closest being Aldgate East Underground Station which is just a two minute walk away. From here it is easy to get to all of the main attractions London has to offer; Buckingham Palace, Leicester Square, Covent Garden and Tower Bridge.

Residential apartment - Residential apartment offers one double size bed with basic amenities. One bedroom apartment.
Residential apartment Apartment - Residential apartment Apartment offers two double size beds with basic amenities. 2 bedroom apartment.
